full_summary:
# [PSIB] Eaton 9PX UPS RACK/TOWER KIT with Associated Products

## [Solicitation Details]

- **Solicitation Number**: SSC-23-00024382:T
- **Amendment Number**: 0
- **Publication Date**: November 8, 2023
- **Tender Closing Date**: November 17, 2023, 14:00:00 EST

## [Summary]

The Solicitation involves the procurement of Eaton 9PX UPS RACK/TOWER KIT with associated products. The procurement is subject to _Set Aside Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business_ (PSIB).

## [Security Requirement]

Security screening for suppliers and personnel is not required.

## [Commodity]

The solicited commodity is Eaton 9PX UPS RACK/TOWER KIT with associated products.

## [Supporting Documents]

- [February 2021 Attchment-2](https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download/5F2FF7E0-77B5-4363-A007-7E87F243B4EC): Eaton 9PX UPS RACK/TOWER KIT with associated products
- [Appendix A, Annex A-22-04](https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download/29880BD8-E851-4792-B796-53600313DC7E): TOE with assumed Security risk

## [Supply Chain and Commodity Management]

Shared Services Canada (SSC) is the Contracting Entity. The Purchaser is Shared Services Canada. The end user is also Shared Services Canada.
